name: Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator
description:
Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator is a physics-based tactics RPG game which you leading your own force in fantasy medieval world.
Build your army and siege equipments. Experience epic siege battles. Lead your people revolting the tyrant!



Features:
·Recruit, train, and command a mercenary force in a procedurally generated medieval world.


·Each of commander has their own skills,troops and traits which can impact combat and story encounters.


·Diverse troops roster. Each kinds of troops have their unique equipment, skills. And each troop has own AI behavior.
